author: Soo Kim
title: Over 120,000 People Have Recovered From Coronavirus Around the World
description: Thousands of recoveries have been reported around the world, including in Europe, the current epicenter of the pandemic, while China has seen nearly 73,000 recover from infection.
content:
The coronavirus outbreak has seen more than 120,000 people recover from infection, as of Thursday, according to the latest figures from Johns Hopkins University.
The virus, which was first reported in Wuhan, a city in the Hubei province of China, has spread … [+5550 chars]
